item.title: Play
item.description: Download Praxis Play 1.4 A hugo theme environment for stand-alone creative code experiments, reducing the learning curve so you can enjoy being in the zone. Subscribe to our newsletter for updates features CSS scope credits installation Shortcodes -- Ready-to-use features to speed up your creative code: Want text not to be selectable? Want to prevent zoom? ml5? smooth scroll? On frontmatter, add the features you need with play: feature1, feature2, etc (Make sure post is .
